document.full_text: the contrast between what gary bettman said in 1995 and '96, as the winnipeg jets prepared to leave manitoba, and what he has said in the last few weeks, as the n.h.l. prepared to return there, shows how much he has learned about the sensitivities of hockey fans in the intervening years.
document.title: back in winnipeg, bettman strikes different chord
lines_and_colors: the contrast between what gary bettman said in 1995 and '96, as the winnipeg jets prepared to leave manitoba, and what he has said in the last few weeks, as the n.h.l. prepared to return there, shows how much he has learned about the sensitivities of hockey fans in the intervening years.
